tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I can't say enough about the outstanding care I've received from Dr. Deepthi. From the moment I stepped into her clinic, I knew I was in good hands. She has not only been a skilled and compassionate dentist but also an incredible support throughout my dental journey.

Dr. Deepthi took the time to listen to all my questions and concerns, patiently addressing each one with a thorough explanation that helped alleviate any anxieties I had. Her commitment to patient education is truly commendable, and I felt well-informed at every step of the way.

What sets Dr. Deepthi apart is her genuine concern for her patients. She went above and beyond by taking the time to speak with my parents, who were understandably worried about my dental health. Her ability to communicate complex dental issues in a way that reassured both me and my family speaks volumes about her professionalism and dedication to patient care.

Beyond the technical aspects of dentistry, Dr. Deepthi has a rare gift of making her patients feel at ease.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

review: Excellent experience, Doctors are very polite and friendly, this solved half of my tooth issue, and the rest treatment was very good and satisfied with no pain during treatment. tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My wisdom tooth extraction was a breeze thanks to Dr. Deepthi's incredible care. I was quite anxious going in, but she patiently explained the entire procedure, including both pre- and post-treatment steps, along with the associated costs. Dr. Deepthi continued to provide excellent care during my follow-up appointment, helping me recover quickly and smoothly

I'm Dr Deepthi s patient since 10  years. All of a sudden I had extreme pain around my ear and headache also. I had been to neurologist and doctor suggested to meet dental doctor once. I immediately called Deepthi mam. She checked all the teeth and made one full scan and said it is because of more contact on two teeth at the back when I chew food and I was clenching my teeth subconsciously. She grinded the back teeth and after a few minutes I immediately felt relief like all the heaviness was gone and she has given me a night gaurd to wear and my symptoms have reduced. Her new clinic is very clean and the doctor is very patient to listen to my problem. Thank you Dr. Deepthi and team.

Dr.Deepthi is a professional. She is highly patient, an avid listener and extremely articulate. 

She explained to me as to why my tooth had this situation, possible solutions and post treatment care.  I was able to relate and understand her narrative easily. 

She was also extremely calm and sensitive in her communication throughout the procedure which was highly comforting. She engaged so well that I did not realise that the procedure had ended. 

She also has a fabulous support staff who is extremely helpful and importantly they always have a pleasant smile on their face which is comforting 

The clinic can be located easily. Hygiene at its best and feels like home. 

I highly recommend Dr.Deepthi, thank you Doc for everything. I highly appreciate your care, guidance and support 

Thanks and Regards
SK

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The entire experience was very good. Dr Deepti was very professional and friendly as well.  She made us comfortable and gave detailed explanation on the wisdom tooth extraction procedure. I would totally recommend Dr Deepti for any dental appointments.

review: Denture is very very comfortable . My first denture made in another clinic was not fitting well and I couldn't eat at all . It was falling off while talking too . Dr Deepthi is a denture specialist explained everything very well and I'm happy to find such a doctor here

Hi this is Rakshitha. I recently had the pleasure of visiting Dr. Deepthi. And I must say it was an outstanding experience. As someone who has had a fair share of dental appointments in the past, I can confidently say that Dr. Deepthi is a true gem in the field of dentistry.

From the moment I walked into the clinic, the friendly and welcoming reception staff set the tone for a positive experience. The waiting area was clean, comfortable, and had a calming ambiance that immediately put any dental anxieties at ease. She took the time to listen to my concerns and addressed each one with patience and genuine care.

During my examination, Dr. Deepthi thoroughly explained the procedures she would be performing, ensuring that I understood what to expect at every step. Her communication style was clear and approachable, and she encouraged me to ask any questions I had – a level of engagement that made me feel like an active participant in my dental care.

In conclusion, Dr. Deepthi and her dental clinic offer top-notch dental care that surpasses expectations. Her expertise, genuine care for patients, and commitment to using advanced technology make her a standout dental doctor in the field. My experience was exceptional, and I am looking forward to my next appointment with confidence and peace of mind.
